name: Walk or Die!
description:
In the game you play as a bomb. You have 2 timers on the top of the screen. As you walk the movement timer ticks down and if you stay still the still timer ticks down. Try to balance them as you progress through this puzzle platformer. There are 2 levels in this game.

Programmer: Abraham Rubio

Art: Yasmine Benjamin

Sound & Music: Bryant Salazar 

Cave Tileset: GrafxKid (itch.io)

Play in full screen to see the full image of the game
